text.english: Blessed is he who comes in the name of the LORD! We have blessed you from the house of the LORD. You are my God, and I will praise You; You are my God, I will exalt You.
text.arabic: مُبَارَكٌ الآتِي بِاسْمِ الرَّبِّ. بَارَكْنَاكُمْ مِنْ بَيْتِ الرَّبِّ. إِلَهِي أَنْتَ فَأَحْمَدُكَ. إِلَهِي فَأَرْفَعُكَ.
